title: GWTG-Heart Failure Risk Score
desc: The GWTG-Heart Failure Risk Score Predicts all-cause in-hospital mortality in admitted patients with heart failure (HF).

orgreference.text: Peterson PN, et al. Circ Cardiovasc Qual Outcomes. A validated risk score for in-hospital mortality in patients with heart failure from the American Heart Association get with the guidelines program. 2010 Jan;3(1):25-32. doi: 10.1161/CIRCOUTCOMES.109.854877. Epub 2009 Dec 8.

data.evidence: Addition of lab and demographic values assigned point values.
data.facts:
Score interpretation:

Total Score Predicted Mortality
0-33 <1%
34-50 1-5%
51-57 5-10%
58-61 10-15%
62-65 15-20%
66-70 20-30%
71-74 30-40%
75-78 40-50%
≥79 >50%

inputs.name: black
inputs.tips_en: Race may/may not provide better estimates of in-hospital mortality; optional
